traits.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The canoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The canoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Uncanny Senses
entries: The canoloth can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The canoloth makes two attacks: one with its tongue or its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (6d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tongue
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15), pulled up to 30 feet toward the canoloth, and is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple one target at a time with its tongue.
